mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freelancer_info(user_id, username, email, phone_number, job_part, working_style, expected_salary, salary_type, experience, career, career_year, skill, origin_file_name, upload_file_name, detail, link, created_at) VALUES(#{userId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{jobPart}, #{workingStyle}, #{expectedSalary}, #{salaryType}, #{experience}, #{career}, #{careerYear}, #{skill}, #{originFileName}, #{uploadFileName}, #{detail}, #{link}, now())
